purpose.summary: This COBOL copybook defines the data structure for a Pending Authorization Request record used in payment processing systems. It includes fields for authorization date and time, card number, expiry date, transaction details, merchant information, and other related data elements. The structure supports capturing and passing authorization request data between programs.
purpose.business_context: Serves credit card or payment authorization workflows, holding details like card info, transaction amount, merchant data, and processing codes for pending auth requests (citation: lines 19-37).

copybooks_used.purpose: Defines the 05-level group for PA-RQ- prefixed fields representing a pending authorization request structure
